node.html: An internal dashboard developed for xiuedu.uz — the official website of Xalqaro Innovatsion Universitet — to monitor user activity, streamline content management, and visualize site-wide data.

frontmatter.title: Developing Online Education Platform for XIU

node.html: Built a robust online education platform for Xalqaro Innovatsion Universitet, aimed at delivering remote learning to students across Uzbekistan and beyond.
A lightweight and accessible digital library system developed for Xalqaro Innovatsion Universitet to simplify book search, lending management, and student interaction.

frontmatter.title: Website for Abdulla Oripov Ijod Maktabi

node.html: Developed the official website for Abdulla Oripov nomidagi ijod maktabi (Qarshi), showcasing school news, leadership, gallery, and contact information via abdullaoripov-maktab.uz.

frontmatter.title: Student Dashboard for TATU Qarshi Filiali

node.html: Developed a single-page web application for TATU Qarshi filiali to help students easily access educational tools, announcements, and schedules in one place.
